name: Panoramania PRO — Game
description:
Look for items and travel around the world in real panoramas in a unique game in the genre of "hidden objects"!

Visit the sea bottom, mountains, the international space station, the famous Parisian opera, elite apartments, etc.

You will see the most interesting corners of our planet and learn a lot of new things.
The goal of the game is to find items from the list. If you have any difficulties, use the hint.

To download levels you need internet connection.

Panoramania - Around the world in 60 panoramas!
Panoramania © AllyTeam 2019.
